title: Cheryl dances with Greatest Dancer's Todrick Hall in all-black outfit
text:
Cheryl made a surprise appearance at Todrick’s show (Picture: Instagram)

Cheryl showed us all what she was made off, as she took to the stage for a surprise appearance during Greatest Dancer co-star Todrick Hall’s show in London.

The singer was dressed to impress as she geared up in an all-black ensemble, consisting of boots paired with shorts and a graphic t-shirt which read ‘you ain’t s***’.

Complimenting her look with bright red lipstick and a pair of gloves, Cheryl surprised everyone when she unexpectedly appeared on stage at the London Palladium to bust her best moves.

In filmed footage which she reposted to her Instagram story, the crowd can be heard going wild when she hits the stage, as jumped about and performed a series of energetic dance moves next to Todrick.

The 36-year-old later thanked her co-star for having her on stage, as she shared a picture of the two in action to her story.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘@todrick I adore you,’ she gushed. ‘Thanks for having me on your stage.

‘You are the true definition of a STAR.’

She later continued to thank Todrick as she shared a picture of them together backstage after the show.

Cheryl later thanked Todrick for having her on stage (Picture: Instagram)

Cheryl rocked an all-black outfit on stage (Picture: Instagram)

‘Y.A.S….! Thank you so much @todrick for having me on join your #hausparty2… love you so much!’

Her appearance comes after her former X Factor co-star Louis Walsh revealed that he ‘loves’ her, following their previous feud.

The two had been involved in a feud for years, stemming from when Louis used to manage her former girl group, Girls Aloud, between 2002 and 2004.

However, The X Factor: Celebrity judge has appeared to put the issues between them to rest, revealing he ‘wishes her well’.

Speaking to Richard Arnold for Good Morning Britain at The X Factor: Celebrity launch, he said: ‘I love Cheryl, I think she’s in a really good place.

‘I love her more than I used to. She’s a good person and she’s had a tough time. Now she’s got a baby and I only wish her well.’

description: Cheryl impressed fans after making an unexpected apperarance at Greatest Dancer star Todrick Hall's London show.
